DOC.brief_summary: The study hypothesis is that a quantitative index can be derived from Tc-99m myocardial perfusion scans that accurately identifies the presence of left ventricular hypertrophy and pulmonary hypertension. Echocardiography provides the reference standard.
DOC.brief_title: Right Ventricular Hypertrophy and Pulmonary Hypertension: A Correlation Analysis
DOC.criteria: Must have an interpretable Tc99m myocardial perfusion scan and an interpretable echocardiogram. Technically inadequate noninvasive test.
